title: Amazon Product Image Requirements 2025 - Complete Seller Guide
content:
Why Amazon Image Requirements Matter

Your product images are the first thing customers see on Amazon. Poor quality images lead to lower click-through rates, fewer conversions, and potentially account warnings. Amazon has strict image guidelines that every seller must follow.

In this comprehensive guide, we'll cover all Amazon image requirements and show you how to optimize your product photos for maximum sales.

Main Image Requirements

The main image (the first image customers see) has the strictest requirements:

  • Pure white background - RGB 255, 255, 255 exactly
  • Minimum 1000 pixels on the longest side (1600+ recommended for zoom)
  • Product fills 85% of the image frame
  • No text, logos, or watermarks
  • No props or accessories not included in the purchase
  • Professional quality - sharp, well-lit, color-accurate

Secondary Image Guidelines

You can have up to 9 images total. Secondary images allow more flexibility:

  • Lifestyle shots - show product in use
  • Scale reference - show size comparison
  • Detail shots - highlight features and textures
  • Infographics - explain benefits with text overlays
  • Package contents - show what's included

Technical Specifications

File Format

Amazon accepts JPEG, PNG, GIF, and TIFF formats. JPEG is recommended for photographs due to smaller file sizes while maintaining quality.

Image Dimensions

  • Minimum: 500 x 500 pixels
  • Recommended: 2000 x 2000 pixels
  • Maximum: 10,000 x 10,000 pixels

File Size

Keep images under 10MB. Larger files may fail to upload or cause slow loading times.

Common Mistakes to Avoid

These errors can get your listing suppressed:

  • Off-white backgrounds - even slightly gray backgrounds violate guidelines
  • Cropped products - the entire product must be visible
  • Blurry images - use proper lighting and focus
  • Promotional text - no "Sale" or "Best Seller" badges on main image
  • Multiple products - show only what the customer receives

Step 2: Upscale if Needed

Step 3: Optimize File Size

A+ Content Images

If you have Brand Registry, A+ Content allows enhanced images:

  • Comparison charts
  • Brand story modules
  • Enhanced infographics
  • Lifestyle banners

A+ Content images have different size requirements - typically 970 x 300 pixels for banners.

Summary

Following Amazon's image requirements is essential for successful selling. Key takeaways:

  • Main image: white background, 1000+ pixels, product fills 85%
  • Use all 9 image slots to showcase your product
  • Invest in professional photography or use AI tools to meet standards
  • Regularly check for policy updates
